name: Incuboratory
description:
Hatch little chicks by maintaining their egg temperatures.

Controls: Mouse to navigate menus. LEFT ARROW and RIGHT ARROW  keys to move your heating lamp over eggs.

Watch the temperature monitor below each egg or watch the egg change color to know when you need to apply heat or back off.

Made for the "Level Up Circle: Beginner Jam #1" game jam.

INCOMPLETE: The game isn't done yet but I'm uploading this for progress' sake. It currently only has Easy mode and you can't lose. Higher difficulties will have more eggs to take care of and I'm aiming for a couple more features such as different egg types and minor obstacles. Also more apparel for the chicks!
